Name: maximize_team_productivity
Description: Maximize the average velocity of teams over sprints

Name: minimize_project_duration
Description: Minimize the time between project_start and project_end

Name: maximize_worker_utilization
Description: Maximize the sum of worker availability across active projects

Name: minimize_technical_debt
Description: Minimize the number of unresolved blockers in sprints

Name: maximize_backlog_completion
Description: Maximize the number of completed user stories per sprint

Name: minimize_sprint_goal_failures
Description: Minimize the number of sprints where achievement_status is not met

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the influence_level of stakeholders reporting high relevance_to_feature

Name: minimize_requirement_ambiguity
Description: Minimize user stories with missing or vague acceptance criteria

Name: maximize_documentation_coverage
Description: Maximize the number of features with linked documentation

Name: minimize_task_context_switching
Description: Minimize tasks reassigned across multiple workers

Name: maximize_skill_alignment
Description: Maximize alignment between required and held skills for assigned tasks

Name: minimize_release_delay
Description: Minimize deviation between planned_date and actual release date

Name: maximize_sprint_stability
Description: Maximize the ratio of tasks unchanged after Sprint Planning

Name: minimize_worker_overload
Description: Minimize number of workers with availability below threshold

Name: maximize_retrospective_followup
Description: Maximize number of improvement_actions implemented from retrospectives
